chapters.title: Chapter 34: The Last Village
chapters.info: Almen Bunt, p. 438—Man from the same village as Holdwin. He pretended to be fixing his cart while Holdwin was talking to a Fade, and later found he was looking for Mat and Rand. He later offered the two a ride, since he does not like Holdwin that much and would rather help the boys than the Darkfriend.
